The intended audience for the GTR is health care providers and researchers. People with questions about genetic testing should speak with a health care provider or genetics professional.",GARD,Fragile X syndrome
What are the treatments for Fragile X syndrome ?,"How might fragile X syndrome be treated? There is no specific treatment available for fragile X syndrome.  M
